title: Free Earth Festival Bangalore Pre-Event
subtitle: Bangalore's Biggest Music Festival
location: Kumarakrupa Rd, opposite Golf Club, Kumara Park East, Seshadripuram, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
description:
One of the Biggest music festival is back to India in Bangalore. It's Free Earth festival Pre-Event happening again after 5years
Featuring line-up 
• *Avalon*- Nano Records (UK) - Goa Trance
• *Nitin*- Hilltop music - Goa Trance
• *Kalinga son* - Hilltop music - Goa Trance
• *Siva prayojan* - Subtrail/Music 4 aliens - Techno 
• *Akhlad Ahmed* - Cafe de Anatolia /Supermatic sounds - Trance fusion 
• *Analilia* - Khazad Records - Melodic Techno 
• *Fluro* - Independent - Melodic Techno 
• *Anna Breathe* - Independent - Melodic Techno

title: Vineeth Srinivasan Live
subtitle: A Musical Journey
location: Palm Meadows, Prestige Ozone, Whitefield Main Road, Whitefield, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Krishnarajapura
description: Join us for an unforgettable evening with Vineeth Srinivasan on 13th July 2024 at Phoenix Marketcity, Whitefield. Presented by Noizz Entertainment in association with Sia Entertainment, this concert promises to be a musical extravaganza.  Vineeth Srinivasan is a celebrated figure in the Indian music industry, renowned for his contributions to Indian cinema. Not only a star in the Malayalam music scene, Vineeth is also a multilingual singer, captivating audiences with songs in Tamil, Telugu, and Hindi. His melodic richness and emotional depth have made him a beloved artist!  Experience his famous hits like "Karale" from Ustad Hotel, "Anuraagam" from Thattathin Marayathu, "Akaleyo Nee" from Urumi, "Thangamey" from Naanum Rowdy Dhaan, and "Mental Madhilo" from Okka Kshanam. Don't miss this chance to see Vineeth Srinivasan live and witness his versatile talent firsthand!

title: Karaoke Nights
subtitle: Ft KJ Naveen
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
description:
Have you ever let your inner bathroom singer play for the rest of the world?
If not, our Karaoke Nights are the perfect opportunity to let loose and sing like no one is watching with a group of people who care about your passion of singing and want to share it with you.
Bring your friends and family to Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru for an unforgettable Karaoke night.

title: Boogie Nights
subtitle: Ft Prashu
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
description:
Make some noise and have fun, since the music gets two times better when a DJ lifts his hands in the air.
Every Friday night, starting at 8:30 p.m., Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru is happy to host DJ PRASHU and his incredible sounds for the musically charged Blockbusters.
Prepare to party and enjoy the evening with excellent food, live music, and cool drinks.

title: Classic Rock
subtitle: Ft. Butterfingers
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
The Butterfingers….the band of brothers…err…band of friends are coming together again at Wanderers to enthrall you with Retro Recapture, as evening of music from the '60s through the '90s!
Highly versatile to make you swing and jive, Butterfingers will give you an evening to relive and revive your memories.
Dominic D’Cruz on Bass & Vocals; Eric Samuel on Guitar and vocals; Niranjan Joseph on Flute, Bass, and Vocals; Canute D’Cruz on Drums & Vocals, and Joshua Costa on the Key Board, the Fab Five of Bangalore are sure to thrill you with their music as they always do.

title: Tribute to Queen
subtitle: Ft Kapow (From Delhi)
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
BAM! Have you ever been hit with a punch so unexpected, it leaves you reeling? Well, that`s exactly what a KAPOW! performance feels like! With explosive energy and stage antics that will make your head spin, KAPOW! delivers exactly what you need and so much more! KAPOW!’s songwriting is both musically and lyrically diverse, from Pop-Rock ballads to eclectic Sci-Fi-inspired tracks. Their 1st album is a rollercoaster ride of musical genres. They even made history by becoming the FIRST INDIAN BAND TO GO DRAG during their album launch, all in the name of learning, experiencing, and creating awareness about Drag culture in India.

*Rs. 500 cover charge mandatory at entry gate.

title: Dimensions
subtitle: Live Music
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Dimensions, a band that performs in various genres, was formed by rock renegades from Bangalore. With nearly 40 years of live music experience between the members of the band, the band`s primary focus is to re-create and offer the best live musical experiences to its audiences.
Be there to see them live at your favourite Hard Rock Cafe Bengaluru location.

title: Tribute to Eric Clapton & The Beatles
subtitle: Ft Crystal Codes
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
At the Hard Rock Cafe Whitefield, the progressive rock band Crystal Codes will pay homage to Eric Clapton and The Beatles.
If you are a Beatles or Eric Clapton fan, (how can you not be?) then join us for this memorable night at Hard Rock Cafe, Whitefield.
And of course, enjoy some beer and great bar fare as the ticket cost includes cover charges.

*Rs. 500 cover charge mandatory at entry gate.

title: Vini Vici at Sunburn Union
subtitle: Witness Vini Vici's electrifying set
location: passport office, Mantri Avenue, next to Koramangala, KHB Games Village, Koramangala
description:
Get ready for an unforgettable night as Vini Vici, the renowned Israeli psytrance duo, takes over Sunburn Union on June 15th! Comprising Aviram Saharai and Matan Kadosh, Vini Vici burst onto the psytrance scene in 2012 with their distinctive fusion of progressive and full-on psytrance. Since then, they have skyrocketed to fame with numerous top-charting releases on Beatport and collaborations with industry giants like Ace Ventura & Astrix, 
Vini Vici first captured global attention with their debut single “The Tribe,” followed by other massive hits such as “Great Spirit,” and “Parapa,” Their dynamic sound has resonated across the globe, earning them spots at premier festivals like Ozora Festival and Tomorrowland.
Known for their powerful basslines, melodic synths, and uplifting melodies, Vini Vici's tracks are a staple in the psytrance world.

title: SCC Movies & Chill - Crazy Stupid Love
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 2/ 3/ 4/ 5 Floor, Nexus Shantiniketan Mall, ITPL Main Rd, Thigalarapalya, Whitefield
description:
"I will never stop trying. Because when you find the one... you never give up." - Crazy Stupid Love

Come join us for an intimate indoor film screening of the romantic comedy 'Crazy Stupid Love' at our newest venue in Bangalore 'Fox In The Field'. Be prepared to indulge in this roller coaster of a film with interconnected love stories sure to make you laugh. 
Movies & Chill is an indoor cinema experience.

title: Concerts Connect
subtitle: Connecting Hearts through Soulful Sounds
location: 99, Residency Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description: Welcome to an evening where the rhythms of your soul find resonance in every note. Join us for a concert experience that transcends mere entertainment to forge deep connections. From catchy tunes that get your feet tapping to soulful melodies that stir your spirit, immerse yourself in a sonic journey that unites hearts and minds. Let the music weave its magic, weaving threads of joy, nostalgia, and emotion as we come together to celebrate the universal language of music

title: Ankita's Brother : A Stand Up Show By Anmol Garg
subtitle: Come & meet the Corporate Babaji
location: Building No.480, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala
description:
Tired of your corporate job?

Confused about what to do in life?
Ever felt lost?

If yes, this show is for you!

Anmol Garg, popularly known as Corporate Babaji, brings to you his theme based set Ankita`s Brother where he shares with you his life story and answers the million dollar question How to find your passion?

This is going to be 1 hour of non-stop laughter!
In short, he`ll help you forget about your corporate job :P

title: Trivia Night
subtitle: F.R.I.E.N.D.S S01-S03 Edition Trivia Night
location: 3rd Floor, 618, 12th Main Rd, above Chicco, 7th Cross, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar
description: Join us for the ultimate F.R.I.N.DS trivia night covering seasons 1 to 3 with amazing liquor prizes

title: Dimsum Masterclass
subtitle: coolest Summer Camp for your kids!
location: Survey 13, Ground Floor, Western Pearl Building, Kondapur
description:
We’re hosting a *Dimsum Masterclass* where the kids will discover:

1. *Rolling and Folding Dumplings:* Learn the art of making perfect dumplings, from mixing the delicious fillings to mastering fun and creative folding techniques.

2. *Three Types of Dimsum:* Your kids will get hands-on experience making three different types of dim sum, each with unique flavors and styles.

3. *Expert Guidance:* Receive personalized tips and tricks from our awesome Head Chefs to help your kids learn something really fun and exciting this summer.

title: Chikmagalur Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Experience serenity of Coffee Land
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description:
This paradise of misty hills and lush green tea and coffee plantations is a sweet escape from the noisy city life, resting peacefully at a height of 3,400 ft. Get ready to immerse yourself in the arms of nature! 
Whether you’re a thrill-seeker or a nature lover, Chikmagalur’s got you covered. Hike through the rugged terrain, or take a dip in one of the many cascading waterfalls, there’s so much to explore

title: Coorg Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Experience the scotland of India
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description:
Time to put on your adventure hat and escape to a place where relaxation and thrill collide in the most tantalizing way possible! Imagine waking up to the aroma of freshly ground coffee beans surrounded by lush greenery worthy of a postcard.

Get ready to explore winding trails and stunning waterfalls, trading city life for an unforgettable adventure that will stay with you forever. Coorg's calling, are you ready

title: Wayanad Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Break the shackles of daily life and expreience adventures in God's own contry.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: The lush-green town of Wayanad in Kerala is hidden in the Malabar region on the Western Ghats. Sparsely populated, the forest-covered region abounds in picturesque hills meandered with streams, tea estates, and wildlife sanctuaries. Referred to as the ‘Spice Garden of India’, Wayanad is a hub of spices such as cardamom, star anise, fenugreek, black pepper, black cumin, etc. Adding to its treasures are Asia’s second largest and India’s largest damn, the Banasura Sagar Dam, the Edakkal Caves from the Neolithic Age to trek to. Witness a majestic sunset at the backdrop of the dam, go hiking, mountaineering, camping, or rock climbing, you’d never run out of fun activities at Wayanad."

title: Kodaikanal Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Get your freedom from the city noise and Experience Princess of Hill stations
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: Kodaikanal, also known as the Princess of Hills in Tamil Nadu, is one of the most popular tourist destinations in South India. Often considered for a romantic weekend retreat, the quaint little town is blessed with a perfect temperature at any given season. If you are seeking time alone in the lap of nature with your loved ones, Kodai is the place to go. Adorned with cascading waterfalls, shimmering lakes, and undulating green hills, the town will leave you awestruck with its natural beauty."

title: Munnar Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Emrance the misty hills and relish your soul with the aroma of the tea estates.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: Munnar is a popular hill station located in the state of Kerala, India. It is known for its breathtaking landscapes, tea gardens, spice plantations, and cool climate, making it a favored destination for nature lovers and adventure enthusiasts. It is also known for its stunning landscapes, tea plantations, and pleasant weather. Munnar, with its scenic beauty, tea gardens, and tranquil ambiance, provides a perfect getaway to experience the charm of Kerala's hill stations

title: Ooty-Connoor Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Experience serene Nilgiri hill station, relish the tea estate aroma!
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description:
Ooty and Coonoor are charming hill stations nestled in the Nilgiri Hills of Tamil Nadu, India. Here's a brief overview of each:

Also known as the "Queen of Hill Stations," Ooty is one of the most popular tourist destinations in South India.
It boasts pleasant weather throughout the year, with cool temperatures making it a perfect retreat from the heat of the plains. Ooty is famous for its sprawling tea gardens, lush green landscapes, and picturesque viewpoints like Doddabetta Peak, offering panoramic views of the surrounding hills.

title: Gokarna-Murudeshwar Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Relish the beach paradise with endless Arabian Sea views.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description:
What do you visualize if we ask you about a weekend on a beach? We would not be surprised if you say Goa. And that’s precisely why we need an alternative to Goa, one which is away from the humdrum of life, one which brings peace and serenity for the weekend.

This is precisely what Gokarna offers. If you are looking for a place for an escapade, to take a break after the week-long 9-5 office hours, and are tired of glancing at pictures of breathtaking beaches on your monitor, go ahead and pack your bags already.

title: Hampi Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Experience Karnataka's favourite UNESCO heritage site and ancient beauty.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description:
Explore Hampi's Ancient Beauty

Hampi, Karnataka, once the Vijayanagara Empire's capital, is a UNESCO World Heritage Site with over 500 ruins and monuments. Known as the second largest city of its time after Beijing, it lies on the Tungabhadra River, showcasing intricate architecture, brilliant engineering, and breathtaking scenery. The Virupaksha Temple, dedicated to the empire's patron deity, is its most significant structure. Hampi blends history with modernity, offering aesthetic cafes, cultural performances, and diverse cuisines in nearby Hippie Town, providing a fresh perspective on life.

title: Pondicherry Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Live your ' Sagar Kinare, Dil Yeh Pukare' Bollywood dreams.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: Pondicherry, often referred to as Puducherry, is a charming coastal town on the southeastern coast of India. Steeped in a unique blend of French and Indian influences, this Union Territory exudes a laid-back and multicultural vibe. The French Quarter, with its cobblestone streets and colonial architecture, transports you to a different era, while the bustling markets and vibrant Tamil culture showcase the town's diverse identity. With its serene beaches, like Promenade Beach and Paradise Beach, and the iconic Aurobindo Ashram, Pondicherry offers a perfect mix of relaxation and spiritual exploration. The delectable French-inspired cuisine and the colorful streets of the Auroville community further add to the town's distinctive allure. Pondicherry is a haven for those seeking a peaceful escape with a touch of cultural richness.

title: DGTL Bengaluru 2024
subtitle: DGTL returns to Bengaluru to recreate the magic and experience you’ve been waiting for
datetime: Jayamahal Palace 1, Jayamahal Main Rd, near Cantonment Railway Station Road, Nandi Durga Road Extension, Jayamahal
location:
DGTL India 2023 saw over 15,000 attendees across 3 days enjoying world-class techno and electronic music, stunning lighting and stage designs, conceptual showcases, and vital sustainability initiatives, resulting in an immersive, audio-visual experience.
Book your tickets now to secure your spot for this year!
DGTL is a global electronic music festival with editions in Amsterdam, Santiago (Chile), São Paulo (Brazil), Tel Aviv (Israel), Bengaluru & Mumbai (India), and during the Amsterdam Dance Event. Besides its focus on music, DGTL features unique art installations and exciting sustainability projects. Its sustainability program sets it apart in the festival landscape.
Important Note: No entry without a wristband. If you lose, damage, remove, or tamper with your tickets/wristbands, no replacements will be issued, and entry will not be allowed.
description: OTHER CITIES

title: Hues of Harmony ft. Priyanka NK
subtitle: Live in Concert!
location: Whitefield Main Rd, Thigalarapalya, Krishnarajapuram
description:
From classic hits to contemporary favourites, Priyanka NK will enchant you with her soulful singing.

Priyanka NK is an Indian playback singer known for her captivating vocals and versatile performances. With a passion for music from a young age, Priyanka honed her skills and rose to prominence in the Indian music industry. She has mesmerized audiences with her soulful renditions across various genres, including Tamil, Telugu, and Kannada. Over the years, Priyanka NK has collaborated with leading music composers and singers, delivering chart-topping hits and unforgettable melodies.

With a repertoire that spans across languages and genres, Priyanka NK continues to enchant audiences with her soul-stirring performances, leaving an indelible mark on the world of music.

title: HOSPITALITY Bangalore x Social Sunday Sundowner
subtitle: Hospital Records, Drum And Bass India & SOCIAL Presents
location: Seventh Block, Plot 118, 80 Feet Rd, above Bodyworks Spa, KHB Colony, 7th Block, Koramangala
description:
Get ready, India! Hospitality is making its electrifying debut in India with the final leg of the tour in Bangalore, bringing you the pulsating beats and high-energy vibes of Drum & Bass at a Sundowner Party. This is a night you won't want to miss, featuring an incredible lineup of top-notch artists who are set to make this event unforgettable.

Join us for an epic night as WHINEY, ANAÏS, DEGS, and IYRE take the stage to deliver an explosive mix of heart-thumping tracks and euphoric rhythms. Known for their unique styles and infectious energy, these artists will have you dancing all night long. They will be supported by SHARMA, BIG TROUBLE, HIGH REZ, HUNNIT D, DWIJ and SINISTER along with Drum and Bass India founder, THE UNTITLED ONE, who has been at the forefront of pushing the DnB sounds in the continent.

title: Artistic License - Bengaluru Open Mic
subtitle: Poetry, Stories, Music, Comedy
location: 1022, 1st floor, Besides Chai Nagri, 80 Feet Rd, 4th Block, S.T. Bed, S T Bed Layout, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560034
description:
Namaskara Bengaluru, 

Artistic License is all about unleashing your creativity in an environment that is judgement-free and conducive. Use the license you have to create impact with your poetry / stories / music / comedy and make those minutes on stage imprint in someone's mind and heart forever. 

do with lit open mics are known for their cozy, positive vibes and has managed to create a bright memory in our 1000+ performers in Bengaluru so far. Be part of the #litttribe and create your vibe in one of the biggest open mic stages in India.

Perform poetry, stories, music or comedy. Any language allowed
